import React from 'react' import AnchorLink from 'react-anchor-link-smooth-scroll' class Header extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { menuOpen: false } this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this) } handleClick(e) { this.setState(state => ({ menuOpen: !state.menuOpen })) document.body.classList.toggle('lockScroll') } render() { let name = this.props.name let hamburgerClass = "hamburger hamburger--collapse" let sections = this.props.sections return(

{ name }
